faq.question: Does it work with both US and international patents?
faq.answer: Yes! We support patents from USPTO, EPO, WIPO, and patent offices worldwide.

faq.question: Can it distinguish independent and dependent claims?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our AI understands patent claim structure and separates independent claims from dependent claims.

faq.question: Does it extract technical drawings?
faq.answer: Yes! The AI references figures and identifies key technical components shown in drawings.

faq.question: Can I analyze patent portfolios in bulk?
faq.answer: Yes! Pro and Team plans support batch processing for prior art searches and portfolio analysis.

faq.question: Is it secure for confidential patent work?
faq.answer: Yes! Enterprise-grade security, attorney-client privilege protection, and we never train on your data.
